definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
silicon chip/also written 硅晶片[gui1 jing1 pian4]

sentences.chinese: 未侦测到晶片组散热器。

sentences.english: Gunars Valkirs and N. Leigh Anderson collaborate on protein array research.
sentences.chinese: 瓦克斯及安德森在蛋白质晶片的研究上，携手合作。

sentences.english: The mayfly is to trout fly fishing, what the microchip is to the personal computer.
sentences.chinese: 鳟鱼是飞的蜉蝣，什么是个人电脑晶片。

sentences.english: For Choke Use, Small Molded and Wire Wound Chip Inductors Provide High Current Characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 小型且模造的绕线晶片电感提供高电流的特性。

sentences.english: Phosphor changes indium chip to need more than silicon chip second precipitate and etch.
sentences.chinese: 磷化铟晶片比硅片需要更屡次的积淀和蚀刻。

sentences.english: The parameters of quartz plate were decided by simulation with computer.
sentences.chinese: 石英晶片的参数由计算机仿真确定。

sentences.english: Applicants are required to pay a deposit of HK$100 per chip upon application.
sentences.chinese: 于报名时，每个晶片需缴付港币100元之按金。

sentences.english: Are the wafers inspected in a dust-controlled area under laminar air flow equipment?
sentences.chinese: 在除尘控制区层流设备下检验晶片吗？

sentences.english: The conductive structure is electrically connected to the LED chip.
sentences.chinese: 传导元件电性连接于该发光二极体晶片。

sentences.english: The new device is a silicon wafer about the shape and size of a playing card.
sentences.chinese: 这个新设备是一张纸牌大小的硅晶片。

sentences.english: The price is proportional to the size of isomorphous.
sentences.chinese: 价格同晶片大小成正比。

sentences.english: Implanted electronic computer chips have faced great success in their various uses.
sentences.chinese: 电子植入晶片在各种各样的用途中大获成功。

sentences.english: The company specializes in making silicon crystal wafers to be used in photovoltaic cells.
sentences.chinese: 该公司专攻用于光伏电池的硅晶片。

sentences.english: To achieve the required bump heights, the solder paste is over-printed onto the wafer bond pads.
sentences.chinese: 为了获得要求的凸起高度，锡膏在晶片焊盘过焊。

sentences.english: Techniques were developed to hook many transistors into chips.
sentences.chinese: 将许多电晶体联结到晶片上的技术已发展成了。

sentences.english: I just registered her microchip and included your name and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 我刚去注册了她的晶片资料，也加入妳的名字与电话。

definition: silicon chip/also written 硅晶片[gui1 jing1 pian4]
laser (loanword used in Taiwan)/also written 鐳射|镭射
USB flash drive (Tw)/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
